display_long_description:
🦎 You wake up inside a ritual. 🦎
💥 This is a world built to break — only physics, instinct, and violence.
🧱 Grab the stone and smash. 🪓 Grab the axe and slash. 💀
Somewhere in this mess, a princess is tied to a cruel ritual — once again.
Save her, or don’t.
The world won’t care.

This is Episode One.
More places and weirder weapons coming.
Enemies get stranger too.

[media]
# 🌀 Telekinesis

Use your bracers to rip stones from walls and throw them into lizard faces.
Hit hard. 
Bodies fly. Columns break. Sacred ruins fall. 
[media]

# ✨ Physics Combat

Every stone is a weapon.
If you can lift it, you can use it.
If you can throw it, you can kill with it.
You can cut limbs too.

[media]
# 🏛️ The Place
Ancient desert.
An Egyptian temple lost in sand.
More awaits you.

[media]

# 🌀 Telekinesis

Use your bracers to rip stones from walls and throw them into lizard faces.
Hit hard. 
Bodies fly. Columns break. Sacred ruins fall. 
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/491821653_627063290476236_1484940024017118217_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=AZ-1GtBAnN0Q7kNvwFIM3Tf&_nc_oc=AdkFrNlDlihhaAIG-yxrT042zxo-R3Cadl7IXmmJxazMYQgJsHogegUs9IvXoPPWLg8&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfpqfxkRZuMzGfN8D7I4MT4tlhEX5L3NIfiRWPpvA-0RDQ&oe=696E62A8)

# ✨ Physics Combat

Every stone is a weapon.
If you can lift it, you can use it.
If you can throw it, you can kill with it.
You can cut limbs too.
